::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Very well. Follow me back to base."

He turns around, but pauses as a though occurs to him. He raises his wrist 
comp to his mouth. "Computer, what is the situation at the Ark?"

"The predacons have retreated." The computer replies.

Zardus chuckles. "Excelent." He turns to Dark One. "The maximals are probably 
in bad shape. We could do a lot of damage. I trust your team is always ready 
for battle..."
